item.title: Research
item.description: Working papers Firm Dynamics and Random Search over the Business Cycle [draft] Dec. 2020 - r&r at ReStud Job Ladder, Human Capital, and the Cost of Job Loss (w/ Federica De Pace and Giulio Fella) [draft] Jan. 2022 Self-Employment and Labor Market Risks [draft] Apr. 2021 Abstract Though public unemployment insurance (UI) schemes represent an important feature of the social safety net in most advanced economies, the self-employed are generally excluded from these programs.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: PhD Macroeconomics The material below is part of the macro sequence for PhD students at NHH. Feel free to email me for the Jupyter Notebooks solving the problem sets. Lecture 1: Dynamic programming [slides] [pset] Lecture 2: The savings problem [slides] [pset] Lecture 3: The lifecycle model [slides] [pset] Lecture 4: Search and matching [slides] [pset] Python workout (Lecture 0) [pset]
